TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void EventHandler(object sender, EventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed EventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub EventHandler(sender As Object, e As EventArgs)
public delegate void EventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, EventArgs ^ e);
type EventHandler = delegate of obj * EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 不包含事件数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains no event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理不包含事件数据的事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle an event that has no event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 中的事件模型基于事件委托, 该委托将事件与其处理程序连接。The event model in the .NET Framework is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler. 若要引发事件, 需要两个元素:To raise an event, two elements are needed: - 一个委托, 该委托标识向事件提供响应的方法。A delegate that identifies the method that provides the response to the event. - 如果事件提供数据, 则为包含事件数据的类 (可选)。Optionally, a class that holds the event data, if the event provides data. 委托是一种类型, 它定义签名, 即方法的返回值类型和参数列表类型。The delegate is a type that defines a signature, that is, the return value type and parameter list types for a method. 您可以使用委托类型声明一个变量, 该变量可引用具有与委托相同的签名的任何方法。You can use the delegate type to declare a variable that can refer to any method with the same signature as the delegate. 事件处理程序委托的标准签名定义不返回值的方法。The standard signature of an event handler delegate defines a method that does not return a value. 此方法的第一个参数的类型为, 并引用引发事件的实例。This method's first parameter is of type and refers to the instance that raises the event. 它的第二个参数从类型派生, 并保存事件数据。Its second parameter is derived from type and holds the event data. 如果事件不生成事件数据, 第二个参数就是字段的值。If the event does not generate event data, the second parameter is simply the value of the field. 否则, 第二个参数是从派生的类型, 提供保存事件数据所需的任何字段或属性。Otherwise, the second parameter is a type derived from and supplies any fields or properties needed to hold the event data. 委托是一个预定义的委托, 专门表示不生成数据的事件的事件处理程序方法。The delegate is a predefined delegate that specifically represents an event handler method for an event that does not generate data. 如果事件确实生成了数据, 则必须使用泛型委托类。If your event does generate data, you must use the generic delegate class. 若要将事件与将处理事件的方法相关联, 请将委托的实例添加到事件。To associate the event with the method that will handle the event, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个名`ThresholdReached`为的事件, 该事件与一个委托相关联。The following example shows an event named `ThresholdReached` that is associated with an delegate. 分配给委托的方法`OnThresholdReached`在方法中调用。The method assigned to the delegate is called in the `OnThresholdReached` method. [!code-cpp[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/cpp/programwithdata.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/cs/programwithdata.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/vb/module1withdata.vb#6)]
